details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-2:202x - 8.10 Forms - 8.10.3.5 Signature fields - Alt for the graphic
details.description: If a portion of the appearance of a signature is represented by a graphic, alternative text shall be provided for that graphic

rule.description: If a portion of the appearance of a signature is represented by a graphic, alternative text shall be provided for that graphic

error.message: A portion of the appearance of a signature is represented by a graphic, but alternative text is not provided for that graphic
